fees.description: Credit card merchant service fee of 0.36% for all payments with Visa or Mastercard.
Credit card merchant service fee of 1.5% for all payments with American Express.
Paper bill fee incl. GST per bill effective from 6 April 2020.  Refer to www.energyaustralia.com.au/home/help-and-support/faqs/paper-bill-fee for details.

gasContract.terms: For full terms and conditions, please refer to our website www.energyaustralia.com.au.

discounts.description: Discount applies to market energy charges, and not to fees and other charges such as late payment fees or GreenPower.

gasContract.variation: Prices may be varied in line with your terms and conditions. We will give you notice before any new prices take effect.

eligibility.information: The details in this fact sheet are for residential customers located in the distribution area outlined with the meter configuration described. Offer only available through Connect Now.

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: Your market contract is ongoing. Your contract will continue until it is ended by either party.
